entry.definition: attività turistiche svolte durante la notte
adjectif pour caractériser des actions ou des objets qui contribuent au climaticide

attestation.text: La colère de la gauche s'est également portée sur les dispositions du projet de loi pouvoir d'achat facilitant le recours aux énergies fossiles. Elle dénonce des mesures 'climaticides'.

entry.definition: luksuriøs og komfortabel form for camping

attestation.text: Glamping er glamourøs camping, hvor du kommer tæt på naturen og kombinerer det primitive lejrliv med mere luksuriøse forhold
Glem det flade liggeunderlag og det utætte telt: Glamping er det nye camping

entry.definition: Forma de acampada que combina o cámping tradicional coas comodidades e servizos propios de aloxamentos de maior categoría.
entry.usage_note: Esta palabra pode atoparse nunha gran variedade de textos, como anuncios, textos publicitarios, entradas de blog etc.

attestation.text: Os bungalows estarán practicamente ao 100 % e as parcelas ao aire libre para autocaravanas, campers e caravanas a un 80 % de ocupación', engade. Ademais, indica que a oferta glamping 'segue gañando adeptos'.

O 18 de febreiro vai haber moitas sorpresas. Temos unha confianza clara en que o cambio xa está aquí en Galicia e vaise a producir o próximo 18 de febreiro', manifestou Besteiro no marco dun encontro con representantes da asociación 'Galicia Baleira' mantido este venres nas instalacións do glamping 'Cabanas das Chousas', nos arredores da capital.

entry.definition: modalidad de camping en la que se dispone de agua corriente, electricidad, camas y otras comodidades de la vida moderna
entry.usage_note: Esta palabra puede encontrarse en una gran variedad de textos, como anuncios, textos publicitarios, entradas de blog, etc.

attestation.text: Por otro lado, cuando vas a un glamping , puede que tengas baño y ducha dentro de tu alojamiento y las comidas cubiertas por el personal del lugar.

entry.definition: consumo de contenido banal o poco estimulante intelectualmente, en especial en redes sociales
entry.usage_note: procedente del inglés

attestation.text: El debate en internet sobre el 'brainrot' se ha extendido tanto que algunos usuarios de las redes sociales han empezado a crear parodias de personas que parecen encarnar la afección.
attestation.source_URL: https://www.nytimes.com/es/2024/06/18/espanol/brainrot-adiccion-redes-sociales.html ‘Brainrot’, la nueva aflicción de internet - The New York Times

entry.definition: Trend, w którym dorośli angażują się w aktywności tradycyjnie kojarzone z dziećmi

attestation.text: Chociaż na pierwszy rzut oka kidulting może wydawać się niepoważny i… Po prostu dziecinny, psychologowie przekonują, że ma bardzo pozytywny wpływ na stan zdrowia. Potwierdzeniem ich tezy jest chociażby badanie, którego wyniki zostały opublikowane w 2016 roku w czasopiśmie „Emotion'. Potwierdzają one, że nostalgia i powracanie do czynności wykonywanych w latach dzieciństwa pozwala zachować ciągłość między tym, co minęło i teraźniejszością.

entry.definition: the habit of avoiding serious tasks by spending time baking cakes, biscuits and other treats
entry.usage_note: The term was originally used in the context of education by students who wanted to avoid studying (https://www.collinsdictionary.com/submission/4645/Procrastibaking).

attestation.text: I should be finishing my paper, but I decided to make muffins instead. Procrastibaking FTW!
I spent three hours procrastibaking instead of studying for exams, so not only did I fail, I gained ten kilos!
Procrastibaking 100 Recipes for Getting Nothing Done in the Most Delicious Way Possible

entry.definition: cucinare torte o piatti salati, procrastinando, ma anche per combattere lo stress
entry.usage_note: le prime attestazioni del termine risalgono al 2020 e alla pandemia

attestation.text: E se adesso la salvezza (alla quarantena) si rivelasse il #procrastibaking? Ricordate la pratica di cuocere qualcosa (di completamente inutile, mi raccomando) mentre siete costretti a rimanere in casa? È una pratica molto in uso tra chi fa smart working e gli studenti: mi interrompo, mi distraggo, e procrastino qualcosa che devo fare per mettermi a impastare (dolci o salati non importa)

Questa pratica si chiama procrastibaking, termine che arriva dall’unione di due verbi inglesi: procrastinate (simile all’italiano procrastinare, e quindi rinviare nel tempo qualcosa che non vogliamo fare) e bake (che invece significa infornare e, per estensione, cucinare). Quindi, dedicarsi alla cucina e di rimandare a domani ciò che non vogliamo fare oggi!

entry.definition: attività turistiche svolte durante la notte

attestation.text: Noctourism: il turismo notturno da provare nel 2025
noctourism (dedicandosi all’osservazione del cielo e delle stelle)
Il noctourism è un tipo di turismo che si vive di notte (dalle esperienze in città a quelle a contatto con la natura)

entry.definition: a festive event around Easter, with egg-themed activities and decorations
entry.usage_note: humorous effect

attestation.text: Hop into the Easter spirit with the Eggstravaganza at Heaven Hill Farm. Enjoy the egg scavenger hunt by following the map to find the egg stations around the farm, gather the different colored eggs and turn them in for a fun Easter treat.
XL Resident advisors get ready for Eggstravaganza in the Bowld Student Commons.

entry.definition: activities for tourists taking place at night
entry.usage_note: It is mainly found in media texts, like blogs or promotional texts.

attestation.text: Noctourism, or the recent trend of exploring the world after dark, is set to transform how night owls see the world in 2025.
Watching the animal kingdom at its busiest is one of noctourism’s many draws, and few experiences illustrate the wildlife action like Australia’s moonlit penguin parade

entry.definition: a cultural trend in which adults behave like kids

attestation.text: Kidulting is a new cultural trend in which adults, particularly millennials, engage in activities traditionally considered more appropriate for children, such as playing with toys and collecting cards. Experts say such pursuits can actually benefit mental health

Dopamine Land is just one example of a new cultural trend called 'kidulting', where adults engage in lighthearted activities traditionally designed for children. In Amsterdam, Wondr invites patrons to 'dive into a sea of pink marshmallows' and 'write on the walls'. The Museum of Ice Cream, a multistorey playground of pools filled with fake sundae toppings, has expanded from New York to several other American cities and Singapore. Bubble Planet, which started in Madrid, will soon have 13 cities in its orbit, including Brussels and Toronto.

entry.definition: a feeling of anxiety experienced leading up to or during January
entry.usage_note: The term often carries a humuous connotation.

attestation.text: Anxiety in January - or 'Janxiety' as it's most articulately described - is a tough one to deal with. In the wake of the post-Christmas blues you're already feeling a little down, so when the worries and the overthinking set in, it can make it hard to feel like you can manage it all.

entry.definition: ato ou processo que resulta em alterações climáticas negativas

attestation.text: Na semana passada, quatro grupos ambientalistas lançaram uma acção judicial contra o grupo por 'climaticídio' devido a um controverso projecto petrolífero na Tanzânia e no Uganda.

entry.definition: a teenager who actively participates in environmental advocacy and sustainable living
entry.usage_note: Also refers to organization Greenagers (https://greenagers.org/).

attestation.text: A teenager who is interested in green issues and takes part in activities that aim to help the environment.

entry.definition: practice of carrying out responsibilities related to adulthood, often with a feeling of faking them
entry.usage_note: Normally used with an ironic hint. jocular.

attestation.text: Some days adulting is so hard, you wish you could return to a world of Trapper Keepers and Barbie brushes.
It's been tough raising my daughter, working full time, man adulting sucks sometimes I swear.

entry.definition: outdoor camping with amenities and comforts (e. g. beds, electricity) not usually used when camping
entry.usage_note: The term can be found in a wide variety of texts (advertisements/publicity, journalistic texts, blogs, social media, etc.).

attestation.text: Consider glamping Want to experience nature without roughing it? Glamping , or 'glamourous camping', could be for you! In recent years, there has been a huge increase in the number of bell tents.

entry.definition: один із напрямків відпочинку на природі у наметах із зручностями готелю: ліжко, меблі, кухня, душ, санвузол
entry.usage_note: It is a foreignism, transliterated into Ukrainian that takes Ukrainian functional affixes.

attestation.text: Ви готові вирушити в незабутню пригоду та створити спогади на все життя? Шукайте не далі, аніж кемпінг Мала Річка, де ми пропонуємо все необхідне для справді унікальних та захоплюючих вражень серед природи. У цій статті ми розглянемо концепції кемпінгу та глемпінгу, їх історію, типи кемпінгів, основні відмінності між кемпінгом і глемпінгом, а також надамо рекомендації щодо планування вашої подорожі.
Ще 30 років про нього ніхто не знав, сьогодні – це один із найпопулярніших напрямків відпочинку серед туристів. У цій статті ми розповімо про глемпінги, як вони виникли та які бувають.

entry.definition: luksuzno kampovanje
entry.usage_note: Obicno se koristi u kontekstu turizma.

attestation.text: Otkrijte sa nama šta je to glamping tj. glamurozni kamping dok se lagano vraćate prirodi i sebi a ne odričući se luksuza na koji ste navikli.

entry.definition: Camping mit Annehmlichkeiten und Komfort (z. B. Betten, Strom, fließendes Wasser), die normalerweise beim Zelten nicht genutzt werden
entry.usage_note: Dieser Ausdruck kommt in vielen Textsorten vor (z. B. Werbung, journalistischen Texten, Blogs, Social Media, etc.).

attestation.text: Bei Glamping handelt es sich um eine glamouröse Art des Campings. Somit ist Glamping insbesondere für naturverbundene Urlauber interessant, die nicht auf einen besonderen Komfort verzichten möchten. [...] Da beim Glamping vor allem der Komfort im Mittelpunkt steht, haben die Unterkünfte nur wenig mit den klassischen Campingzelten gemeinsam. So sind die Glamping-Unterkünfte mitunter mit bequemen Kingsize-Betten, Küche, Bad, Klimaanlage, Minibar, WLAN und einem TV-Gerät ausgestattet. Zudem stehen auf den Glamping-Anlagen häufig noch weitere Extras, wie beispielsweise eine Sauna, Whirlpools sowie Sport- und Unterhaltungsmöglichkeiten zur Verfügung.

entry.definition: ტურიზმის ნაირსახეობა, რომელიც აერთიანებს ბუნებრივ გარემოში ყოფნას კომფორტთან ერთად

attestation.text: გლემპინგი, ეს არის ე.წ. გლამურული კემპინგი, ტურიზმის ინდუსტრიის ახალი მიმართულება, რომელიც საქართველოში დიდი პოპულარობით სარგებლობს.

entry.definition: ákveðin gerð af efni á samfélagsmiðlum sem þykir lélegt, eða þær neikvæðu afleiðingar sem neysla slíks efnis hefur á andlega heilsu
entry.usage_note: Íslenskt nýyrði sem hefur verið notað sem þýðing á enska orðinu brainrot. Orðið heilarotnun hefur einnig verið notað.

attestation.text: Nýjasta tegund þessa efnis er ítalskur heilafúi sem einkennist af kynjaverum, blendingum dýra við önnur fyrirbæri á borð við skó, ávexti eða flugvélar.

entry.definition: el acto de causar daños o destrucciones significativas al clima

attestation.text: El 'Climaticidio', el último 'reality show' del presidente de Estados Unidos

Cuatro grupos ecologistas denunciaron en Francia al gigante de los hidrocarburos TotalEnergies por 'hechos similares a un climaticidio', en relación con su proyecto petrolero EACOP en Tanzania y Uganda, indicaron este lunes sus abogados.

entry.definition: activités touristiques prenant place la nuit.

attestation.text: Le noctourisme a plus que jamais le vent en poupe comme l’annonce « Booking » dans ses prédictions des tendances touristiques pour 2025
Le « noctourisme » ou tourisme de nuit devient la grande tendance qui bouleverse nos habitudes de voyage, selon une étude menée par le site Booking.
Si la quête d’un voyage hors des sentiers battus vous anime, le concept de « noctourisme » va éveiller vos sens.

entry.definition: qui contribue, de façon importante, au réchauffement climatique.

attestation.text: De la COP28 à la COP29, l’année climaticide de TotalEnergies
Eacop : le projet climaticide de TotalÉnergies en 6 chiffres

C'est climaticide', s'insurge vendredi 12 mai sur franceinfo Marine Tondelier alors qu'Emmanuel Macron a répété le même jour à Dunkerque qu'il ne fallait plus 'ajouter' de normes environnementales après avoir appelé à une 'pause' réglementaire au niveau européen.

entry.definition: luksuzno kampiranje u prirodi

attestation.text: Pojedini hrvatski kampovi odnedavno u svojoj ponudi imaju i vrhunske glamping smještajne objekte, uglavnom grupirane u prava mala glamping naselja u kojima se, osim usluge smještaja, pruža zaista istinski doživljaj luksuza i privatnosti, a nerijetko i više od očekivanog.

entry.definition: un produit alimentaire qui ressemble au fromage mais qui ne contient pas de produits laitiers

attestation.text: Ce « fauxmage » fabriqué à Alexandria, en Ontario, ne contient pas de lait. Il est à base de cajou, d'huile de coco, de levure alimentaire et de miso.
Par conviction ou par envie de limiter les produits laitiers, vous avez envie de vous essayez à la recette du fauxmage ? Vous êtes au bon endroit !
Pour les fans de fromage aux laitages d'origine animale : direction les 'fauxmages', qui, comme leurs noms l'indique, proposent des saveurs fromagères, mais sans laitages d'origine animale.

entry.definition: a food resembling cheese but containing no dairy products

attestation.text: Cheese eaters may soon be tucking in to fauxmages, which as the name suggests, provide a high-end alternative to traditional dairy products.

entry.definition: luxusný kemping
entry.usage_note: používaný hlavne v reklame a marketingu.

attestation.text: s bezplatným Wi-Fi a výhľadom na more. Klimatizované ubytovanie je vzdialené 23 km od mesta Baška. Fisherman's glamping village se nachází v letovisku Klimno a nabízí restauraci, nepřetržitě otevřenou recepci, bar, zahradu, venkovní

entry.definition: altération de certaines facultés cognitives qui résulterait d'une surconsommation de contenu en ligne perçu comme étant insignifiant ou dépourvu de valeur intellectuelle

attestation.text: Désolé de devoir faire cette mise au point en cette période de haine généralisée, d'écervelage des masses et de décapitation des professeurs pas dans le moule.

entry.definition: a period of vacational time along which people occasionally work remotely
entry.usage_note: only used in its plural form

attestation.text: L'avènement du télétravail suite à l'arrivée de la crise sanitaire continuera-t-il de faire des adeptes de « tracances » ?

entry.definition: a period of vacational time along which people occasionally work remotely
entry.usage_note: only used in its plural form- Other ortographic variants: trabajaciones, travacaciones

attestation.text: La palabra trabacaciones se emplea desde hace, como poco, una década para expresar la idea de trabajar durante las vacaciones y está bien formada por acronimia a partir de la combinación de trabajo y vacaciones.
¡También es el destino perfecto para irte de trabacaciones ! El espacio local de trabajo colaborativo incluye una cervecería y una panadería.

entry.definition: kampovanje u prirodi u luksuzno dizajniranim kampovima
entry.usage_note: Česta upotreba u marketniške svrhe u turizmu

attestation.text: Crna Gora je, što zbog klime, što zbog prirodnih ljepota idealna za glamping – luksuzno kampovanje, kažu za Monitor Marijana i Ivan Žegura.

entry.definition: tendencia de los adultos a comportarse como niños

attestation.text: El kidulting se refiere a la práctica de adultos que consumen productos, disfrutan de actividades o se sumergen en culturas que normalmente se asocian con los niños. Esto incluye, pero no se limita a, coleccionar juguetes, ver películas animadas, jugar videojuegos o incluso participar en actividades como el cosplay o asistir a convenciones de cómics. A diferencia de los niños, que se relacionan con estos elementos de manera natural, los adultos lo hacen para revivir momentos de su infancia, buscar consuelo emocional o simplemente disfrutar de una forma de entretenimiento libre de responsabilidades.

entry.definition: practice of parents sharing content about their children on social media
entry.usage_note: The term often carries a critical connotation, especially in discussions about privacy, digital consent, and child protection.

attestation.text: Then there’s 'sharenting'. Today, many children’s social media presence starts with a sonogram, posted, obviously, without consent. One study from Britain found that nearly 1,500 images of the average child had been placed online by their fifth birthday.

entry.definition: the worldwide prevalence of obesity, often framed as a global public health issue
entry.usage_note: Often used in public health discourse to emphasize the transnational spread and impact of obesity as a global epidemic

attestation.text: an escalating global epidemic of overweight and obesity – ‘globesity’ – is taking over many parts of the world.

entry.definition: older adults who are in good health and maintain active, engaged lifestyles
entry.usage_note: Often used in gerontology, health promotion, and positive aging discourses.

entry.definition: an urban area designed to absorb, store, filter, and reuse rainwater through green infrastructure and permeable surfaces, in order to reduce flooding, improve water quality, and enhance resilience to climate change
entry.usage_note: The term is frequently used in the context of climate resilience, particularly in Chinese and Southeast Asian urban development discourse.

attestation.text: Sponge cities' are urban areas with abundant natural areas such as trees, lakes and parks - or other good designs intended to absorb rain and prevent flooding.
